creator: jarno.pelkonen@exidio.com
text:
JMeter needs an "assertion defaults" component that can be put under containing 
containg controller (= any sampler or Thread group). 

This easies building up test cases that do several requests and most of the 
responses are validated with the same logic. This is a common case with HTTP 
test cases. 

"Assertion defaults" component could be a containing component, i.e. it would 
contain the actual assertions. Responses would be validated against:
- all assertions defined for the individual request (= the current way) 
- plus againt all the assertions in the "assertion defaults" components in the 
request's parent nodes. By this way a Jmeter user could define default 
assertions at Thread group level and then more detailed assertions for samplers 
under the thread group.

This seems to happen by default now; also copy and paste works, so I'm closing 
the call, but feel free to re-open if there's something I've missed
